channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Driving Winston: When Sir Topham Hatt gets an overconfident new track car named Winston to drive him around, Thomas has to find a way to get this new guy to listen. (S27, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Jokey gives Farmer's racing snails extra speed in 'The Round Up', then in 'Waffle Wednesday', Chef gets jealous when Lily starts to make waffles that are more delicious than his. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit save a town from being pulled underground in 'The Secret of the Sand Serpent', and in 'The Disappearance of Peggy Scratch', the pals search for the leader after a flight test. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help. (S11, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball; Skye and Rory Flip It; Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel; Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat: Four bite-sized adventures with the pups of the PAW Patrol. (S8, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Mayor needs her motorcycle cleaned before a big race in 'The Crew Builds a Car Wash', then in 'The Crew Plans Grandpa Day', the pups celebrate Grandpa Day. (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn: Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble! (S6, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel: When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! (S1, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Friendly rhinos gather at the Watering Hole in 'The Riddle of Raging Rhinos', and in 'The Trouble in the Tundra', Sam and Kit are on the case when the Mice Squad goes missing in the Arctic. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost in 'Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws', then in 'Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party', an alien zaps unwitting party guests into floating space bubbles. (S8, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington is (not) watering Mr Curry's plant in 'Paddington's Plant Problem', and in 'Paddington the Artist', Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. (S2, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat: The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday. He has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple! (S2, ep 27).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Jump: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gerald Giraffe: Gerald Giraffe is new to playgroup! He's trying to make friends with Peppa and the group, but finds being so tall is making playing hide and seek quite a challenge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Taxi: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and the family to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house to drop off their shopping off, but that's not the last trip of the day for her.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bubbles; Emily Elephant; Polly's Holiday; Teddy's Day Out; Mysteries; George's Friend; Mr. Scarecrow; The Time Capsule: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Polly's Holiday; Teddy's Day Out; Mysteries; George's Friend; Mr. Scarecrow; The Time Capsule: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
channel.desc: The hamsters go to the Place of All Foods in 'Num-Nuggets', then in 'Hey Foni', the hamsters think Dad's phone is talking to them. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus; Movie Night; Art House Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken: The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure. (S3, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: A sweet build is needed when 'The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop', and then in 'The Crew Builds A Dance Floor', Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Farmer's snails go on strike in 'The Snail Whisperer', and then in 'Smurfs Might Fly', The Smurfs prepare for their sarsaparilla banquet, unaware that Gargamel has enchanted the thicket. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all in the wrong place, and a series of wacky misadventures ensues. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Puppy Chase!: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back. (S6, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger builds a mechanical rain cloud in 'Pups vs the Hum-Cloud', then in 'Pups Stop the Mid-Air Magnet', Otis gets a powerful magnetic drone. (S11, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in 'Pups Save the Treasure Cruise', then in 'Pups Save Rocket Ryder', Ryder and Alex get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV. (S8, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson: Madame Gazelle is giving the playgroup a singing lesson, helped by Mummy Rhino on the piano. When the parents arrive, the children perform their song. (S7, ep 36).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Competition: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing! (S7, ep 37).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: America; The Diner: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canyon Country; Hollywood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Sea Treasure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Two robots take on more than they can handle in 'Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends', then in 'Pups Save the Rainbow', Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that drains Adventure Bay of colour. (S10, ep5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway tries to help rescue Danny in 'Pups Rescue a Rescuer', then in 'Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond', a spooky sound forces the frogs from their home. (S6, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kico the Kittycorn: Every time a rainbow appears, a Kittycorn family gets their special baby Kittycorn! So when Gabby unboxes a baby Kittycorn, all the Gabby Cats help her take care of it. (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Has A Cough; Police Car: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hop, Skip and Jump!; Rescuing Miss Rabbit!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: The Slowest Race in the World: When Thomas, Kana, and Diesel 'race' to see who can go the slowest, their lack of speed provides challenges - and lets Thomas see what he might have missed. (S27, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Diary: Peppa learns that Mummy Pig used to keep a diary when she was her age, so Peppa decides to give it a try.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playing Golf: George and Peppa spend the day playing golf with Grandpa Pig, but they are much more interested in the colourful minigolf course next door.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf appoints Rescue Smurfs in 'The Majestic 5', then in 'Kitchen Klutz', After Clumsy saves Chef's life, Chef takes Clumsy on as his assistant in the kitchen. It's a catastrophe. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Zuma and Hurricane get swept off the beach in 'Pups Save the Mountain Surfers', then in 'Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home', Mayor Humdinger takes his kitties for a holiday. (S11, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We get wet in 'Pups Stop a Big Leak', there's fun in 'Pups Save a Baby Anteater', Ace helps in 'Pups Save a Hatch Day', and Mr Porter's truck gets stuck in 'Pups Save the Munchie Mobile'. (S8, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: A beaver causes a power outage in Builder Cove in 'The Crew Builds a Beaver Home', then in 'The Crew Fixes a Road', Speed Meister damages the road ahead of a parade. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday: Starla's birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets taken by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze, and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late? (S6, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Game Show: It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! CatRat leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Someone's snatching all the fruit in 'The Mysterious Fruit Thief', then in 'The Riddle of the Wrestling Lizards', the agents try to bring some peace to a pair of brawling gila monsters. (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A meteor makes an eel gigantic in 'Mighty Pups Stop a Mighty Eel', then in 'Pups Save a Floating Royal Carriage', Sweetie decides to commandeer the Princess's royal carriage and horse. (S9, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Hoops: Peppa and her friends play some very active games in the gar-den and together they learn to hop, skip and jump.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington throws a Birthday party in 'Paddington Clowns Around', then in 'Paddington and The Bad Swap', Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot game card. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playing Pretend: When Peppa's bike gets a flat tyre and needs fixing, Peppa and her friends have fun riding their imaginary bikes and jumping in pretend muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Scooters: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. He decides it would be faster to ride back and he discovers riding scooters is such fun. He shows Mummy Pig how fun it is.

channel.desc: Move To Music: Madame Gazelle is getting Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Undersea Party: Peppa, George, Molly Mole and Freddy Fox play in the garden. Molly digs a tunnel and hits a box of pirate treasure.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Club House; Detective Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Shop; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Talking; Woodland Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub', and in 'Pups Save a Drive-In', the pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector. (S10, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's reflector causes a bridge to burn in 'Pups vs. The Hum-Flector', then in 'Pups Save a Capybara', the Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara. (S10, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Planes, Trains, and Kitty Balloons!: Gabby unboxes a passport-like travel book and three tickets that take her on a dollhouse travel adventure. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Danny's Pirate Bedroom; Weather Station: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roller Disco; Guinea Pigs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Bruno's Blustery Day: On a windy day, the team has to band together for an important delivery. When it seems the elements will be too much, they learn they can ask each other for help. (S27, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Rock Garden: The children learn about the weather. There is a new friend for Peppa, and Grandpa Pig is making a rock garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Charity Shop: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, Peppa and George decide to take all the things they don't use anymore to the charity shop, which raises money to help others.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: The Smurfs put their parenting skills to the test in 'Bringing Up Smurfy', then in 'The Makeover', Vanity wants to design an outfit for the Smurfs, but he and Tailor have different visions. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwells send Sam and Kit a strange case in 'The Frozen Stowaways', then in 'The Puzzle of the Empty Pond', a salamander mom wonders why her dry pond hasn't filled up with water. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger is ready for a special day in 'Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch', then in 'Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone', the Museum has a brand-new exhibit - which goes missing. (S11, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox in 'Pups Save a Jukebox', then in 'Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire', a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go wrong. (S9, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove when 'The Crew Builds A Giant Dam', then in 'The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm', Farmer Zoe has a squirrel problem. (S1, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Tiger Treasure: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure. (S6, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Spaceship: The Dollhouse Delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden! (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Marshall Kitty gets trapped in a life-sized pinata in 'Pups Save a Hum-nata', then in 'Pups Stop the Foggy Skies', Humdinger pushes fog into Adventure Bay. (S10, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Families: While drawing pictures at playgroup, Peppa and her friends learn about each other's families, from Suzy sheep who lives with Mummy Sheep to Freddy Fox who lives with Mr. Fox.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Owl: Peppa and George visit Granny and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa is building a special hiding hut to watch birds in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; The Big Hill: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington wants to make a special cake when 'Paddington Celebrates Mrs Bird's Day', then in 'Paddington The Table Tennis Champ', Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team! (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park in 'Paddington Gets Fit', then in 'Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair', Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair accidentally gets broken. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.
